message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm still a bit below your last offer, but I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
